en.title: CLASH OF **RADIANTS**
en.text:
A competitive Free Fire tournament featuring Battle Royale and Clash Squad modes.

Game Format:
  • Round 1: Battle Royale (3 Matches – Bermuda, Kalahari, Purgatory)
    • Top 4 teams qualify for Round 2.
  • Round 2: Clash Squad (Best of 3)
    • Top 4 teams compete (1st vs 4th, 2nd vs 3rd).
    • Winners advance to the Finals.
  • Finals: Clash Squad (Best of 3)
    • Winner is declared.
Rules & Regulations:
  • Eligibility: Minimum Level 20
  • Fair Play:
    • No VPN & No PC Players
    • Gun Attributes OFF
    • Character Skills & Loadouts OFF (CS Mode)
  • Restricted Weapons & Items (Clash Squad Mode):
    • No Double Vector
    • No Grenades & Throwables
  • General Restrictions:
    • No Teaming Up in Battle Royale Mode
    • Hacks/Cheats = Entire Team Disqualified

en.title: **MEME** CREATION
en.text:
A creative meme-making competition featuring a Buzzer Round and a Creation Round.

Category: Individual Schedule:
  • Round 1: Buzzer Round - 09:00 AM – 10:00 PM IST (Online)
  • Round 2: Creation Round - 09:00 AM – 10:00 PM IST (Online)
Rules & Gameplay:
  • Round 1: Buzzer Round
    • Platform: Online G-meeting
    • Participants must identify meme templates within a given time.
    • Quick responses earn points; incorrect answers may result in negative marking.
    • Participants with the highest scores qualify for Round 2.
  • Round 2: Creation Round
    • Platform: Online G-meeting
    • Participants select a provided topic and create a meme using given templates.
    • Memes must be original; pre-existing content or AI-generated memes are not allowed.
    • Submission Formats: JPEG, PNG, GIF.
    • Only one entry per participant; multiple submissions lead to disqualification.
    • Late submissions will not be accepted.
Rules and Regulations:
  • Content Guidelines:
    • Memes must be free from offensive, inappropriate, or controversial elements.
    • No hate speech, discrimination, political bias, or explicit content.
    • Memes must maintain a respectful and lighthearted tone.
    • Use of copyrighted images without attribution is not allowed.
  • Tools & Creation Methods:
    • Participants may use any online meme generator, graphic design software, or image editing tool.
    • AI-generated memes are strictly prohibited.
    • Popular meme templates may be used, but must include a creative twist.
  • Plagiarism & Fair Play:
    • All memes must be original; copying existing content without modification is not allowed.
    • Collaboration is prohibited; each meme must be an individual effort.
  • Rights & Usage:
    • By submitting, participants grant event organizers permission to use and display their memes with due credit.
    • Organizers reserve the right to exclude non-compliant entries.
  • Code of Conduct:
    • Participants must uphold fair competition and respect fellow competitors.
    • Any manipulation, cheating, or rule violations will lead to disqualification.
Judging Criteria:
  • Creativity – Uniqueness of the meme and originality of the concept.
  • Humor – How effectively the meme delivers humor in an engaging way.
  • Relevance to Topic – How well the meme aligns with the competition theme.
  • The decision of the judges is final. No disputes or appeals will be entertained.

en.title: Clash of **Radiants**
en.info: Classic Battle Royale & TDM Competitive Tournament
en.text:
Schedule:
  • Starts from 10:00 AM

    • Overview:

    A competitive BGMI tournament featuring Classic Erangel and TDM modes.

    Game Format:

    • Weapon Restrictions (TDM Mode):
      • Only M416, Scar-L, and AUG are allowed
      • Grenades are allowed

en.title: CLASH OF **RADIANTS**
en.text:
Schedule:
  • Starts from 10:00 AM

    • Overview:

    Step into the world of Valorant, the ultimate tactical shooter where precision and strategy determine the victor! Compete in intense 2v2 Swift Play matches, showcase your skills, and advance through the brackets.

    • Use your own devices as the event is held online
    • Any rank can participate
    • Game mode: Swift Play
    • Teams of 2 players allowed

    • Winning teams advance to the next bracket
    • No cheats or hacks allowed – Fair play is mandatory
    • Only one site is executable, and players must adhere to pre-match rules

en.title: **Crewmates** and Conspiracies
en.text:
Schedule:
  • Round 1: 10:30 AM – 11:30 AM
  • Round 2: 1:30 PM – 2:30 PM

    • Overview:

    A thrilling tournament combining digital and real-world gameplay, testing deception, strategy, and teamwork.

    Format:
    • Round 1: Classic Mode (Mobile/PC)
    • Platform: Mobile/PC (Players must have the game installed)
    • Game Mode: Crewmates vs Impostors
    • Game Time: 10-15 minutes per sub-round
    • Winning Conditions:
      • Crewmates win by completing tasks or ejecting all impostors.
      • Impostors win by eliminating crewmates or sabotaging the mission.
    • Advancement: Top players based on scores qualify for Round 2.
    • Round 2: Real-World Among Us
    • Platform: Physical game, no mobile/PC required.
    • Game Time: 1 hour (Meetings every 10 minutes)
    • Gameplay:
      • Crewmates complete real-world mini-games as tasks.
      • Impostors secretly eliminate crewmates.
      • Voting meetings every 10 minutes to discuss and vote out impostors.
    • Winning Criteria:
      • All impostors caught → Top 3 highest-scoring players win.
      • Impostor(s) survive → They take top positions based on count.
    Rules & Regulations:
    • Registration: Players must register individually.
    • Round 1 Rules: No external communication, fair play required.
    • Round 2 Rules: Players must follow real-world game mechanics and participate in discussions.
    • Eliminated players must stop playing immediately.
    • Time management is crucial for task completion.

en.title: **Squid** Game
en.text:
Schedule:
  • Round 1: 10:30 AM - 11:30 AM
  • Round 2: 1:30 PM - 2:30 PM

    • Overview:

    A thrilling elimination-style event with three intense rounds.

    Format:
    • Round 1: Carousel Game – Move in a circle while music plays and form groups as per the announced number.
    • Round 2: Red Light, Green Light – Move forward on 'Green Light' and freeze on 'Red Light'. Late movers are eliminated.
    • Round 3: Surprise Round – Details revealed at the event.
    Rules:
    • Individual event (No teams).
    • Each player assigned a unique number.
    • Majority can vote to suspend a game.
    • Misbehavior leads to elimination.
    • Judges' decisions are final.

en.title: **Soundcheck** Showdown
en.text:
Schedule:
  • Slot 1: 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM
  • Slot 2: 1:00 PM - 2:30 PM

    • Overview:

    A unique competition blending rhythm, strategy, and quick thinking through three exciting rounds.

    Format:
    • Round 1: Melody Match – Identify the song from its BGM within 10 seconds.
    • Round 2: Linguistic Lyricist – Guess the Tamil song from English-translated lyrics.
    • Round 3: Wordy Tunes – Sing songs containing a given word in a relay format.
    Rules:
    • Team event (2-3 members per team).
    • No external help or communication between teams.
    • Points based on accuracy and speed.
    • No verbal clues or humming allowed.
    • Teams involved in malpractice will be disqualified.
    • Judges' decisions are final.

en.title: **Screen** Geeks!
en.text:
Schedule:
  • Slot 1: 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM
  • Slot 2: 1:30 PM - 2:30 PM

    • Overview:

    An anime-themed quiz competition featuring four exciting rounds.

    Team Structure:
    • 2-3 members per team
    • Solo players allowed (for the brave otakus!)
    Time Duration: 45-60 minutes Rules & Gameplay:
    • Round 1: Who’s That Character? (Picture Round)
      • Teams guess the anime character from a blurry/silhouette image.
      • Faster answers earn bonus points!
    • Round 2: OP & ED Madness! (Music Round)
      • Listen to 5-10 seconds of an anime opening/ending.
      • Guess the anime (extra points for song & artist name)!
    • Round 3: Fact or Cap? (True or False)
      • A fun round with weird, mind-blowing anime "facts."
      • Teams answer TRUE or FALSE before the timer runs out!
    • Round 4: Showdown! (Buzzer Round)
      • Fast-paced rapid-fire questions.
      • Teams hit the buzzer to answer first!
      • Wrong answers = -1 point penalty
    How to Win?
    • Highest points = Winner
    • In case of a tie → Sudden Death Question

en.title: **AUCTION** ARENA
en.info: A strategic team-based IPL auction game with quiz, bidding, and squad formation.
en.text:
Schedule:
  • Starts from 10:00 AM

    • Overview:

    Round 1: IPL Quiz

    • 25 IPL-related questions.
    • Top performers advance to Round 2.

    Round 2: Team Formation & Auction

    • Teams of 3 members.
    • Each team selects a leader and draws a random team name.

    Squad Composition

    • 11 players + 1 impact player.
    • Max 4 overseas players.
    • Role-specific limits: 4 batsmen, 4 bowlers, 3 all-rounders, 2 wicketkeepers.

    Auction Rules

    • Each team gets ₹60 crore.
    • Player base prices: ₹2 crore (Overseas), Varies (Capped Indian), ₹25 lakh (Uncapped Indian).
    • Bid increments: ₹25 lakh up to ₹10 crore, ₹50 lakh beyond ₹10 crore.
    • Once funds are exhausted, no more bids allowed.

    Golden Ticket Rule

    • Each team gets one Golden Ticket.
    • Freezes a bid, making it final.
    • One-time use per team.

    RTM Card Rule

    • Each team gets one RTM card.
    • Allows matching the highest bid for a previously owned player.
    • If used, the team retains the player at the matched price.

    Final Scoring & Transparency

    • Final scores calculated based on player performance stats.
    • A password-protected PDF with scores will be shared in the WhatsApp group.
    • Teams verify results before finalizing winners.
    • Highest-scoring team wins.
